column1: in memory of emily conner harris -- rinehart and sons funeral home inc.| first: last: born: august 18
column3: 2015 this memorial provided by:rinehart and sons funeral home inc. jesup
column12: 2015 at her residence. the wayne county
column13: georgia native was a member of odum united methodist church. emily along with her husband were the founders of greenview farms which is the oldest continuous breeder of polled herfords cattle in the state. she was active in all aspects of the farming operation for over 70 years. she was a member of numerous cattle and farming organizations and supported the local ffa and 4-h clubs. she loved sharing the farm with youth and disabled children for annual turkey hunts. she enjoyed working with her family maintaining a beautiful garden and sharing her joy of cooking with many. she was preceded by her husband of 60 years
column16: janet harris gay. survivors are sons and daughters-in-law
column22: and oscar l. and sonya harris both of odum
column27: georgia; 10 grandchildren; 23 great-grandchildren; numerous nieces and nephews; two special caregivers
column28: ollie mae moore and diann franklin. funeral services will be held at 2:00 p. m.
column31: 2015 at rinehart and sons with rev. darrell carter and rev. patrick brannen officiating. interment will be in liberty cemetery. active pallbearers will be joe b. harris
column36: and wesley harris. visitation will be held at 6:00 to 8:00
column39: 2015 at the funeral home. in lieu of flowers
column40: memorial donations may be made to odum united methodist church
